cast.overview: A poor French teenage girl engages in an illicit affair with a wealthy Chinese heir in 1920s Saigon. For the first time in her young life she has control, and she wields it deftly over her besotted lover throughout a series of clandestine meetings and torrid encounters.
cast.title: The Lover

also_known_as: เหลียงเจียฮุย
details.biography:
Tony Leung Ka-Fai (Chinese: 梁家輝, born February 1, 1958) is a four-time Hong Kong Film Award-winning Chinese film actor from each decades since the 1980s

Because he is often confused with actor Tony Leung Chiu-Wai, Tony Leung Ka-Fai is known as "Big Tony", while Tony Leung Chiu-Wai is known as "Little Tony", nicknames which correspond to the actors' respective physical statures.
details.name: Tony Leung Ka-fai
